channel.title: Fr
channel.description:
I was working on this for the past week or so after that "Camelot PI 474 " source came out. There isn't anything "super special" about this source but it does have clipping, a decent fletching/crafting skill ( the fletch/craft aren't mine came with the source )
Things I have done:
-started work on firemaking -fixed majority of the IDE errors that were shown -fixed the client so it works with pest control -used somebodies woodcutting tutorial and improved it a little bit -started rework on barrows/pest control but didn't get that far... -ripped an unreleased version of an agility class i had on a spare HD and made into enums/cleaned the shit up more. -half assed a greegree system(currently only ::item 4024)
I really don't suggest using this as there are dupes like crazy but meh...I don't know I just got bored of it so fast. I compiled with the newest java 7.21 so make sure to have that or recompile with an older java or something.
Source:
http://www.mediafire.com/download/q6u92llsl3nihec/Source_Files.rar
Client:
http://www.mediafire.com/?q6u92llsl3nihec,nsjb92o1fg3s2od
Credits: -Makers of that camelot source whoever it was -RsInf3ction -Myth-Scape -Int Bauk -Myself -Couple of consultations with friends on Skype on how to properly do a few things
Only saying this once..
-Do not message me asking how to make something work... -You must use my client or pest control will mess up(or just rip the fix from entitydef :p0

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Strucker, post:7, topic:519732”]better than deathlypvps[/quote]lol…anything is better than trisidia/deathlypvp

at the very least HOPEFULLY somebody will actually try to make a decent ape atoll course now LOL you have pretty much all the information in there for it same with werewolf.

Read full topic

item.title: Fr
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Int Bauk, post:3, topic:519732”]what am i getting creds for? :)[/quote]pathfinding … the one camelot had was pretty much the tutorial yours looked honestly like the same thing but I did tweak it just a little so meh. I also did partially look at one of your old releases to get ideas ( I actually think you released chin ranging? )

[quote=“killerjens9, post:5, topic:519732”]pics?[/quote]why do you need pics? I pretty much stated everything I fixed in this but here is a log from the old FR forums I was using:

May 16th - Added Woodcutting
May 16th - Worked on itemType method, got some common stuff fixed to go in right slot.
May 17th - Smithing teleport fixed, cleaned up the teleport class some
May 17th - Added yaks, added yak spawn, gave strength, 1 hit K) random ability
May 17th - Never found anything to really add to karajama so just put message there that it would be added later
May 18th - Dragon breath fixed, ripped a dfs code cause cba… , started antifire pot base, tweaked kbd accuracy cause I hate easy bosses.
May 18th - Bunny Hop fixed
May 18th - Shrimps can now be eaten/fished
May 18th - Added pnpc, unpc, edited the updatePlayer method, used Aintaro’s agility class for base for agility obstacles.
May 20th - Greegree support

I started working on it like the day after Camelot came out so like I said not a lot was done and I really don’t take credits for anything. It was pretty much bug fixes.

Read full topic
